title: Create a Marketing SWOT Analysis
description: A strategist is preparing for a planning session and needs to create a SWOT (Strengths, Weaknesses, Opportunities, Threats) analysis for the marketing department.

tasks.description: List the internal strengths of the marketing team (e.g., 'Strong organic social media following').
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies and documents internal positive factors.

tasks.description: List the internal weaknesses (e.g., 'Low email marketing engagement').
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies and documents internal negative factors.

tasks.description: List the external opportunities (e.g., 'New social media platform gaining popularity with our audience').
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies and documents external positive factors.

tasks.description: List the external threats (e.g., 'A major competitor just increased their ad spend').
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies and documents external negative factors, completing the SWOT analysis.
